title: nADenum Anavam
sahitya:
nADenum Anavam pOnadumE nIyE naDandennuL vandAyE endAyE


anupallavi

  mOna munIndirar dhyAna veLiyinilE jnAnavoLi paravum Ananda deivamE


caraNam    nAda guhaiyilE tAnenum bOdhamE naDu nADi muDivilE naTamiDum pAdamE
jyOtiyilE ezhunda shuddhAtma vEdamE shon manam kaDandanai cinmayAtItamE
